posts.postText:
Well guise, with goldcraft back online, I decided to give all of you an admin-powered voiced tour of the grand spleef arena. After you see the tour, there is also the video of the last spleef match, Punkedmind versus Dumdadumdoo. What an epic match it was too. Captured here and youtubed for posterity :D

TOUR: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wcCWUZwjdiY
FINAL MATCH: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OVqgvmm7ujs
